alert.note: Alert for Hopkins; McLean; Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 4:59PM EDT until July 24 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Muhlenberg County in south central Kentucky... South central McLean County in northwestern Kentucky... East central Hopkins County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Madisonville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Madisonville, Central City, Earlington, Mortons Gap, Powderly, Graham, Greenville, Hanson, Sacramento, Bremen and South Carrollton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 107 and 121. Western Kentucky Parkway between Mile Markers 40 and 62. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
